meanings: (동물) pig, (식용의) hog, (수퇘지) boar, (다 자란 암퇘지) sow, (유아어) piggy, (새끼 돼지) piglet, (식용으로 쓰는 새끼...
the sound of cutting the throat of a pig
a necklace for the neck of a pig

vlive.korean: 그러다 돼지 돼! You are going to become a pig! 듣기 View video AB6IX : 영민이의 '몰래라이브 #1'
vlive.english: You are going to become a pig!

vlive.korean: 그렇다면 여러분들은 불백 어때요? 돼지 불백! Then, how does marinated pork sound? 듣기 View video SF9 : 🍀🍀
vlive.english: Then, how does marinated pork sound?

vlive.korean: [확신] 돼지 저금통! [So sure] Piggy bank! 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.5
돼지가 등급이 있어요? Oh, there are grades on pork? 듣기 View video tvN D : 내신등급이 내 인생의 등급일까? [언어의 온도 : 우리의 열아홉] Ep.1
vlive.english: Oh, there are grades on pork?

vlive.korean: [누군가 그리고 넣어놓은 돼지 종이 선택] 그럼 저는 이 멤버가 그린 종이에다가... [Chose a paper with a piggy a member drew] I'll go with this paper a member drew on... 듣기 View video Dispatch : [Dicon] "다현’s Special Day" (디아이콘 : 트와이스)
vlive.english: [Chose a paper with a piggy a member drew] I'll go with this paper a member drew on...

examples.korean: Pigs were grunting and squealing in the yard. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 마당에서는 돼지들이 꿀꿀거리고 꽥꽥거렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: The piglets are taken from the sow to be fattened for market. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 새끼 돼지들은 어미 돼지에게서 떼어 내어 시장에 팔기 위해 살을 찌운다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The piglets are taken from the sow to be fattened for market. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: You greedy pig! You’ve already had two helpings! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 욕심 많은 돼지 같으니라구! 넌 벌써 두 번이나 덜어 먹었잖아! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
